Please note: vouchers will display their original expiry date.
Spend your printed vouchers when checking out in a store
How to spend vouchers in store

If you think your printed voucher might not be clear enough, try printing it out again (vouchers can be printed more than once), or write down the 22-digit number next to the barcode and take this into the store with your printed vouchers. If your barcode doesn’t scan, our colleagues can type in the barcode number at the till so you can redeem your vouchers.

It doesn’t matter if you print your vouchers in black and white or colour.

Print your vouchers clearly on white paper. We won’t be able to scan smudged or unclear barcodes at the till.
Please select at least one voucher to print.
